meanings.def: a weapon with a long metal blade (= sharp cutting part) and a handle
examples: to draw/sheathe a sword (= to take it out of/put it into its cover)
I thrust my sword into his chest.

meanings.def: to be something that has both advantages and disadvantages
to fight or argue with somebody
people who write books, poems, etc. have a greater effect on history and human affairs than soldiers and wars
to kill somebody with a sword
examples: All the men were put to the sword.

meanings.def: a bad or unpleasant thing that might happen to you at any time and that makes you feel worried or frightened
to stop fighting and return to peaceful activities
